      • boundNumber

        public static int boundNumber(int number,
              int lowerBound,
              int upperBound)
        Bounds a number to a certain range.
        Parameters:
        number - Number to be bounded.
        lowerBound - The lower bound of the range.
        upperBound - The upper bound of the range.
        Returns:
        The original number if it is inside the range, lowerBound if it is below, and upperBound if it is above
